title: Shairport4W -- Airplay speaker for windows
description:
Shairport4W is an airplay client for your windows computer.
That is, you'll be able to stream music from an iOS device or itunes on a different computer to the computer that has Shairport4w running on it.
Great for home theater PCs. Just plug in a good set of speakers and run Shairport and the computer will appear on your iOS devices and in iTunes on other computers connected to the same wireless network.
Instructions for setup are included...
Enjoy!
